title: YAPAY.AI
text:
At Yapay AI, we’re driven by our passion to transform the way businesses operate and enhance people’s lives through cutting-edge AI solutions. Our vision is to create intelligent assistants and innovative AI technologies that simplify complex tasks, boost productivity, and unlock new possibilities. We are not only dedicated to developing practical AI applications but also actively engaged in AI research, pushing the boundaries of what AI can achieve. Join us in shaping a smarter, more efficient future with AI at its core.
We are currently developing an Automated Data Extraction solution for Findex service providers and direct customers. This tool will utilize an AI model to extract structured data from documents such as receipts, invoices, and credit card statements.

title: About Us
text:
Niyazi Kemer

I graduated from Trakya University Faculty of Architecture in 1995 and began my career in various roles within architectural offices, including technician, architect, team leader, and project manager. In 2008, I transitioned into Building Information Modeling (BIM) and served as a BIM manager in the ENKA architectural project group for two years. Starting in 2012, I worked as a technical specialist at AUTODESK. In August 2023, I founded YAPAY.AI to pursue my passion for artificial intelligence.

The other Co-Founder will be revealed soon.
